meanings.sent1: The injunctive order was issued by the judge to stop the construction.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer filed an injunctive motion to halt the unfair business practices.
meanings.sent3: The injunctive warning on the sign made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her injunctive tone was as firm as a steel door.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the injunctive sign caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The injunctive measures were put in place to prevent further damage.
meanings.sent2: The company faced injunctive actions for violating environmental regulations.
meanings.sent3: The injunctive restriction on candy sales at school caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: His injunctive decision was like a shield protecting the community.
meanings.sent5: The loud alarm served as an injunctive signal to evacuate the building.
